name: Vogue, The Explorer
description:
Join the adventures of Lara into a Vogue strange world. You suddenly wake up in a strange world. You will need to use 3d platforming skills in order to evade.
You will encounter some weird creatures that will attack you.
Prepare your brain since you will need to solve some puzzles in order to advance in game. You will need to use triggered actions to open gates, to trigger moving platforms, and to use your fighting skills to fight robot enemies and bosses
